name: Project Moonshot (Phasechangegames)
description:
Supernova behind you. Moon in front. The only way is through. Fly well, fly fast.

Designed, coded, and overall created by Casey Fallon (me.)

I'm not much of a coder, but I gave it a shot! I've made about 7 games, but this is the first one I've finished entirely myself though there's three that I did the art but not the coding...so they look much nicer and play far better. 

Certainly there's a lot more to do, and that can be done, but at least the bones are ok. The part I most wanted to nail was the feel of flying in space for real rather than the arcade style that other space games tend to use.
